name: Coca-store
body:
### Beverages Inventory Application

I planned an app which stores how many beverages consumed from our office's inventory.

#### Plan I - Bar Code Reader

A bar code reader with a cheap web camera can be used. I tested it with ZBar but it worked, but with a fearly low probability.
It can be improved with a special case made around the webcam and some LEDs for the appropriate lightning, but I rejected this idea
because making a case, testing it and using can be a long running task

#### Plan II - Button controlled selector

A two-layered UI with buttons of Coca Cola products. First the buttons from here: [products](https://secure.coca-cola.hu/content/hu/corporate/markaink.aspx) than the images of the real products.

I rejected it because it is not "geek" enough, however, I planned to code it.

#### Plan III - Voice Regognition System

User say a name of a product, or just some keywords, like "zero" (which can points both to Coca Cola Zero and Fanta Zero Orange), than user says "fanta" and boom, the product selected by the app. Than user says how many bottles (like 1 or 2 or 6) than "ok" or "cancel".

Here you can test the first version [speech](speech/index.html)
